Song.title: The Gospel Song
Song.copyright: Words by Drew Jones © 2002 Sovereign Grace Worship (ASCAP) Music by Bob Kauflin © 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise (BMI)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C2 | F2/C | C2 | F2/C | ]
Verse: [C]Ho[G/B]ly [Am]God, [C/G]in [F]love, [Gsus]be[G]-[| C]came [F2/C |] [C]Per[G/B]fect [Am]Man [C/G]to [Dm]bear [Fmaj7]my [Gsus]blame [G] [C]On [G/B]the [Am]cross [C/G]He [F]took [E7]my [E] [Am]sin [G/F]By [F]His [Em]death [Am]I [Gsus]live [G] [ ]a[C]gain [| F2/C | (to modulate) Asus A]
{key:D} Verse: [D2]Ho[A/C#]ly [Bm]God, [D2/A]in [G]love, [Asus]be[A |]-[D2]came [G/B A/C# |] [D2]Per[A/C#]fect [Bm]Man [D2/A]to [Em7]bear [Gmaj7]my [Asus]blame [A A/C#] [D2]On [A/C#]the [Bm]cross [D2/A]He [G]took [F#]my [Bm2]sin [A/G]By [G]His [F#m7]death [Bm]I [Asus]live [A] [ ]a[D]gain
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse holy god in love became perfect man to bear my blame on the cross he took my sin by his death i live again verse holy god in love became perfect man to bear my blame on the cross he took my sin by his death i live again

Arrangement.description: Arrangement from Songs For The Cross-Centered Life
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C2 | F2/C | C2 | F2/C | ]
Verse: [C]Ho[G/B]ly [Am]God, [C/G]in [F]love, [G]be[Gsus]-[| C]came [F G |] [C]Per[G/B]fect [Am]Man [C/G]to [Dm]bear [Fmaj7]my [Gsus]blame [G] [C]On [G/B]the [Am]cross [C/G]He [F]took [E7]my [Am]sin [G/F]By [F]His [Em]death [Am]I [Gsus]live [G] [ ]a[C]gain [| F G |]
{key:D} Verse: [D]Ho[A/C#]ly [Bm]God, [D/A]in [G]love, [Asus]be[A |]-[D]came [G A |] [D]Per[A/C#]fect [Bm]Man [D/A]to [Em]bear [Gmaj7]my [Asus]blame [A] [D]On [A/C#]the [Bm]cross [D/A]He [G]took [F#7]my [Bm]sin [A/G]By [G]His [F#m]death [Bm]I [Asus]live [A] [ ]a[D]gain
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse holy god in love became perfect man to bear my blame on the cross he took my sin by his death i live again verse holy god in love became perfect man to bear my blame on the cross he took my sin by his death i live again
